data.text: Why is there going to be a fucker convoy coming to DC when SCOTUS already ended vaccine mandates???

#FreedomConvoy2022 It is time to shut down DC, CA & NY. It is time to take this country back from tyrannical leaders of government! All vaccine, masks mandates & vax passports must be eliminated. We are not China, we are land of the free & brave, not land of totalitarian tyranny.

This DAMN mask and vaccine crap is utterly and totally ridiculous!!!! How dare AMERICA and this damn government create and damn “law” in DC and wherever else making people wear a mask and get some LAB MADE “vaccine” jab in order to live our lives and enjoy what public amenities!
Dc nasty as shit you need a vaccination card pew
I bet it's gonna come out that the reason it was so hard to get a vaccine in DC last year was because the fed had seized the first batch of doses meant for the city

Is it TRUE that Maryland doesn’t consider you a covid vaccination for Maryland if you got your vaccine elsewhere? I am hearing Maryland is 84% vaccinated per the CDC but only 80% per MD Dept of Health because ppl got the jab in VA or DC.  Any clarification will be helpful.
I could literally present a coupon as a vaccination card and DC restaurants could care less
Ppl out here faking vaccination cards in DC… and it is easy to that.
… don’t DC require Vaccination proof to do anything??? So my question is… how did Kyrie play yesterday 🤔🤔🤔

Just a PSA 
If you're in DC and going to any restaurant, you will need your photo ID and proof of vaccination.

If you are a parent of a 6-23 month old in the DC area and are interested in demonstrating in support of the FDA proceeding with review of a vaccine that Pfizer says is safe and effective for that age group, please @ me to coordinate around options (and please RT!)

From Dr. Robert Malone  The FDA announcement about waiting for third dose data sounds to me like they failed to meet the efficacy endpoint.  Everything else is just spin and DC Kabuki theater.  This vaccine is not working to prevent Omicron infection, replication and spread.

And if we marched on DC to complain about it? Those same people would call you terrorists for complaining.
It’s not you. It’s THEM.

loving the @_DCHealth new vaccine record system. Despite getting my vaccine at a DC sponsored/run site, they don't have my records! Do I have access to this vital health information elsewhere? Yes I do. Am I still annoyed about it? Also yes

I wish Canada all the best. My focus is on America 🇺🇸. NY, Boston, Philly, DC, Cali, Louisiana, and Chicago has fallen (unconstitutional vaccine mandates). All 50 states must unite. We can not wait for the America truckers convoy to start (it has been three years).

I was in DC this weekend and was at the bar in the hotel lobby waiting on some food. This couple came up and sat down, the bartender asked them if they had their vaccination card, they said no, she told them they couldn’t sit in the dining area. So they moved to the tables…

So you can’t do anything in DC without a COVID card… I forgot my card at home and showed the hostess proof with my phone that I got a booster. The server’s reply was, “that doesn’t mean you got the vaccine” 🤦🏾‍♀️🤦🏾‍♀️ Some people aren’t that intelligent.
This guy next to me sounds like such a wet blanket and such a "nice guy". Also he called DC N*z* G*rm*ny and I bet I know exactly where he stands on the mask and vaccine mandates.

My heart hurts for my family and friends in Canada right now. What is happening in Ottawa and Quebec at the hands of racist Trumpers, under the guise of vaccine protests is reprehensible. 90% of Canadian truckers are vaxxed! This is a dry run for plans on DC. Wake up people.

I recently traveled to DC. I don't understand how it’s still open. You need a vaccine card & a negative COVID test to stay in any hotel. Wherever you go, you must present a vaccine card or apply for an exemption at each location. Texans should think twice before complaining!

DC Del. Eleanor Holmes Norton says 49 House and Senate GOPers have vowed in a letter to vote against the next FY 2022 approps bill unless it defunds enforcement of federal and DC COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

7th time Republicans have attacked DC's vaccine mandates this Congress.

In the 7th attack on local DC vaccine mandates this Congress, 49 Republicans vowed to vote against the FY22 appropriations bills unless they defund both federal and DC COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

The current FY22 continuing resolution expires on Feb. 18.
